briefTitle: The Acute Effects of the Angiotensin-converting Enzyme Inhibitor Enalaprilat on Flow Distribution

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* BCPC patients at time of routine pre-Fontan catheterization
* Patients between the ages of 2 months and 5 years old

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients who have had ACEI therapy within 24 hours of the procedure

outcomeMeasures.title: Systemic, Pulmonary and Cerebral Blood Flow at Baseline and After Enalaprilat
Systemic, Pulmonary and Cerebral Resistance at Baseline and After Enalaprilat
outcomeMeasures.description: Systemic, pulmonary and cerebral resistance is compared at baseline and after enalaprilat
